mapper.insert: insert into resume(id, phone, personal_advantage, expected_position, work_experience, project_experience, education_experience) values (#{id}, #{phone}, #{personalAdvantage}, #{expectedPosition}, #{workExperience}, #{projectExperience}, #{educationExperience})
mapper.update: update resume set personal_advantage=#{personalAdvantage}, expected_position=#{expectedPosition}, work_experience=#{workExperience}, project_experience=#{projectExperience}, education_experience=#{educationExperience} where id = #{id}
